snippet: Kohei Uchimura of Japan won a record fifth straight all-around gold medal at the gymnastics world championships in Nanning, Japan.
abstract: Kohei Uchimura of Japan wins a record fifth straight men's all-around gold medal at the gymnastics world championships in Nanning, Japan.
lead_paragraph: Kohei Uchimura of Japan won a record fifth straight all-around gold medal at the gymnastics world championships in Nanning, Japan.

headline.main: Fifth Straight Gold at Gymnastics World Championships Is Record
